Will Call Cancellation.name: Will Call Cancellation Process
Will Call Cancellation.content:
Tools: ShipStation, All PO Spreadsheet, Marketplaces, ZenShip

For Orders NOT highlighted in the All Supplier PO Spreadsheet:

  1. Locate the order in the All Supplier PO Spreadsheet and paste the order number. If it does not turn red, proceed to cancel the order.
  2. In ShipStation, tag the order as Buyer Cancellation Request, then perform any necessary actions before canceling the order.
  3. In ChannelAdvisor, click Fail Shipment Order or Cancel Order, select Buyer Canceled as the reason.
  4. Notify the buyer that their order has been canceled.
  5. Cancel the order on the marketplace / 3DSellers.

For Orders highlighted in the All Supplier PO Spreadsheet:

  1. Locate the order in the PO Spreadsheet and paste the order number. If it turns red, proceed.
  2. Search in ShipStation for a generated label or tracking. If none, continue.
  3. In ZenMighty, under POS → Order → All, verify the PO number and tags.
  4. In the PO Spreadsheet, highlight the order red. If separator is yellow, add note BUYER CANCELED. If black, add note BUYER CANCELED - PLEASE STOCK.
  5. If uploaded to ZenShip: if status Pending → Cancelled; if Picked/Completed with no label → contact warehouse. If warehouse confirms stop, proceed; if not, inform buyer cancellation is no longer possible.
  6. In ChannelAdvisor, cancel order with Buyer Canceled and tick “Do Not Notify Marketplace.”
  7. Cancel in ShipStation and on marketplace / 3DSellers.
  8. Send buyer confirmation email of cancellation.

Dropship Cancellation.name: USAuto Cancellation - No Quote ID or Order ID in ZM
Dropship Cancellation.content:
Tools: ShipStation, ZenMighty, Marketplaces, PMB

  1. In ZenMighty, if the status is Awaiting Shipment and there is no Quote ID or Order ID, cancel the order in ZenMighty and file away the notification in Help Desk (HD).
  2. In ShipStation, tag the order as Buyer Cancellation Request and perform all required pre-cancellation actions.
  3. Paste the order into the All Supplier PO Spreadsheet, then add a note: Buyer canceled.
  4. In ChannelAdvisor, cancel the order if possible.
  5. Message the buyer confirming the cancellation.
  6. Cancel the order on the marketplace or through 3DSellers.

Dropship Cancellation.name: USAuto Cancellation - Processing Status in PFG
Dropship Cancellation.content:
If order is Pending, Processing, or Shipped in PFG:

  1. If Processing, tag in ShipStation as Buyer Cancellation Request and Pending Cancellation.
  2. In Purchases Mailbox, email Team Kool Vue East Service (kveastservice@carparts.com) with subject “Cancellation Request” using template:
    1. May we please request the cancellation of this order? The buyer wants to cancel.
    2. PO Number: [Order Number]
    3. Sales Order Number: [In PFG]
  3. Message buyer that you will attempt to intercept the order.
  4. Once USAUTO confirms, proceed: cancel in ShipStation, ChannelAdvisor (if possible), message buyer, cancel on marketplace / 3DSellers.
  5. Post cancellation in All Supplier PO Spreadsheet.

Dropship Cancellation.name: Meyer Cancellation Process
Dropship Cancellation.content:
Tools: Meyer site, ChannelAdvisor, ShipStation, Marketplaces

  1. In ChannelAdvisor, change Store to WooParts → Fulfill → Orders, search order and get Rithum Order ID.
  2. Ask PO team to cancel in Meyer site using Rithum Order ID.
  3. Once confirmed, in ChannelAdvisor cancel or refund order (Buyer Canceled), tick restock and do not notify marketplace, add public note “Buyer canceled.”
  4. Cancel in ShipStation (Amazon); if eBay does not appear, skip.
  5. Message buyer that order has been canceled.
  6. Cancel on marketplaces (eBay or Amazon).

Reshipment Process.name: How to create a reshipment order in ShipStation
Reshipment Process.content:
1. In ShipStation, click "New Order."
  2. Change the Store to "Manual Orders." Under "Order #," enter the order number and then add "-RS."
  3. Under "Recipient Information," input the buyer’s name and complete address.
  4. Add "Total Paid."
  5. Under "Order Line Items," click "Add a Line Item." Input the golden SKU ordered, then add the price (Unit Cost).
  6. Click "Save Order."
  7. Copy the order number with "-RS" and place it on the Return Tracker > Reshipment tab. Fill in all the necessary information in the sheet.

Return Process.name: How to create a return label in ShipStation
Return Process.content:
1. From Order Details, select Returns icon in the left-side menu. Then, click the Create Return button.
  2. Select the item, the quantity being returned, and the return reason (Others). Then, click Continue.
  3. Configure the shipment details for the return label. Then download the return label.
    • Return To: The WH that fulfilled the order. Do not change the carrier; edit the DIM.
  4. Screenshot the return label and paste on your reply in 3DSellers.

Return Process.name: Returnless Refund Guidelines
Return Process.content:
• WooParts
    • If the feedback rating is below 99% and the order total is under $50, proceed with a Returnless Refund regardless of the return reason.
    • After issuing the refund, politely request a positive feedback from the buyer.
  • AutoApex
    • Always issue a Returnless Refund, regardless of order value or reason, as we are still working to improve performance.
  • Return Reason: Item Not as Described
    • Proceed with a Returnless Refund for orders below $100.
  • Uninitiated Returns (Orders Under $50)
    • If the customer has not yet opened a return, issue a full refund proactively.
    • This avoids creating a return request and helps keep our return rate low.
  • Orders Over $50
    • Assess the situation/reason to determine whether a Returnless Refund or return request is more beneficial to the business.
  • Damaged Items
    • Automatically proceed with a Returnless Refund.
    • Ensure the buyer provides complete supporting images before processing.

Shipping Issues.name: eBay International Shipping Issues
Shipping Issues.content: For international shipping issues, request the customer to open a case on eBay. No further action is required on our end, and we are protected from any penalties. Simply email the customer to let them know that eBay will handle the issue.
